alert.note: Alert for Buckeye, Avondale; Central Phoenix; Deer Valley; North Phoenix, Glendale; Northwest Valley (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 11:08PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 1145 PM MST... At 1108 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Glendale, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Glendale, Surprise, El Mirage, Tolleson, Youngtown, Sun City, Glendale Sports Complex, Downtown Peoria, Arrowhead Mall, Downtown Glendale, Metro Center, and Camelback Ranch. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 134 and 140. AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 202 and 213. US Highway 60 between mile markers 144 and 160. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Buckeye, Avondale; Central Phoenix; Deer Valley; North Phoenix, Glendale; Northwest Valley
